posts.description: exploring all of London today! 🇬🇧 be sure to follow along on IG Story! 👑💂🏼 i think walking the glass floor on top of the Tower Bridge was my favorite part. 😜 // my scalloped pink trench coat is on sale AND currently an extra 30% off! shop my look here: http://liketk.it/2ra1V #liketkit @liketoknow.it #ltksalealert #euroTRIPP

found the most perfect clutch for the black tie event during #rStheCon last weekend! 💕 can't wait to share more details about my time in Dallas soon! // we have officially arrived in London and are soooooo excited to be here! 🇬🇧 for now it's some to get some sleep 😴, but be sure to follow along on IG Story as our adventure begins tomorrow! don't forgot to watch @tripp's too, he's showing some of the eclectic details of our ultra-modern @citizenm hotel room! 💂🏼#citizenm #london #euroTRIPP #sassyredlipsticktravels 
http://liketk.it/2r9xS #liketkit @liketoknow.it

andddd we are off! ✈️ excited to be flying with @wowair as we travel to Europe over the next two weeks! i flew with WOW to Paris last year and had the best experience, so they were my go-to for this trip. you wouldn't believe how affordable it is to fly WOW to Europe. 🙌🏼 can't wait to share more in my full blog post when we return! for now, follow our travels on IG Story. we have a layover in Iceland and i'm hoping to get a peek at some pretty skies. ✨#wowair #wowstopover // shop my exact #airportstyle outfit here: http://liketk.it/2r8YX #liketkit @liketoknow.it #sassyredlipsticktravels #eurotripp

this sleek white bikini from @lovekiwiplum is up on SRL if you missed my post over the weekend! 🌴 i've always stayed away from white swimwear, but i can't believe how flattering this swimsuit is! the designer is based in LA and wants all women to feel comfortable & confident at the pool or beach. 🙌🏼 see more by clicking the link in my bio! // shop my accessories here: http://liketk.it/2r8tt #liketkit @liketoknow.it #ltkswim #ltkcurves

i’m jetsetting off to Europe tomorrow and am so excited to be traveling with my new Samsung #GalaxyS8plus from @Tmobile! this phone is literally the perfect companion for an international trip with unlimited data in 140+ countries and the Bixby Vision feature which identifies landmarks & translates signs in foreign languages. 🌏 how cool is that?! can’t wait to share all of my experiences as i travel around London and Paris! ✈️ stay tuned! #samsung #tmobile #ad

one year ago today, @tripp and i packed up all our belongings into a 17-foot truck and followed our dreams to San Francisco. with both of us only needing a laptop for work, we could have chosen any city in the country, but we chose here. it has proved to be the single best decision we've made together & has brought more blessings into our life than we can count. so much has changed in the last year: my blog has grown exponentially thanks to all of YOU, robbie quit his job and became a full-time writer, we've made incredible friends and connections here in the city, and we've had amazing experiences growing and evolving in every facet of our life. this post is as much a love letter to San Francisco as it is to one another, because moving to this city has quite literally changed our lives. nothing beats waking up in this beautiful & eclectic place and working together to build our dreams. so happy anniversary, San Francisco! we love you forever. ❤️ #mySF #oneyear

ended #rStheCon with a little SASS {hint: check out the clutch!} and elegance for tonight's black tie event. 💕 so thankful for the opportunity to be invited, for the social media friends who are now real life friends, and the amazing blessing it is to do what i love! have a good night, babes! i gotta get some zzzz's for an early morning flight home to my guy. ✨ // shop my exact look via screenshot or link here: http://liketk.it/2r7Da #liketkit @liketoknow.it #startedwithascreenshot

today's outfit for the final day of #rStheCon! i had to go all out @topshop for the stunning Garden Party lunch they hosted this afternoon. ❤️ catch all the details of the event and meeting sweet @rachparcell on IG Story! // shop my exact look, including this adorable gingham top for under $60, here: http://liketk.it/2r7se #liketkit @liketoknow.it #ltkunder100 #ltkcurves #startedwithascreenshot

confidence is sexy. 💋 absolutely obsessed with this crisp & clean two piece from @lovekiwiplum and i'm talking all about it on the blog today! it's the perfect mix of sexy, minimal, and comfort. head over to SRL for more! // shop my accessories here: http://liketk.it/2r7iY #liketkit @liketoknow.it #ltkswim

spring florals for this beautiful day in Dallas! 🌸 did you catch this afternoon's picnic with @ShakeShack and @BananaRepublic on IG Story?! easily my favorite burger experience ever. 🍔🍟🌻 #rStheCon // shop my look for day 2, including this adorable embroidered denim jacket for under $50, here: http://liketk.it/2r6Ra #liketkit @liketoknow.it #ltkunder50 #startedwithascreenshot
